column1: Elros was a member of the Woodland Realm and a guard who assisted in the capture of Thorin and Company. He was also the Keeper of the Keys of Thranduils dungeons. After becoming intoxicated with the kings butler
column3: Elros loses the keys to the hobbit Bilbo Baggins. Later
column4: after Thranduil had given the order to lock all gates to the kingdom
column5: he informed Legolas that Tauriel had left armed with her bow and blade. He was portrayed by the New Zealand actor Robin Kerr.
